@arestlessart Howard did three pieces for @LaMonnaieDeMunt  - A Brussels Requiem, Sinbad & Ofeo Majnun which then went round other companies in Europe including Festival d'aix. He also wrote youth operas for @glyndebourneedu which took place in the opera house https://t.co/e2gYiv8evo
@arestlessart The important thing is to work with the community to understand where it should go, and where it will be most meaningful for them to perform. üòÅ

@arestlessart I think that most of the time the 'main' stage is not the right place for community opera. And I have huge problems with the concept of 'main' stage - it's a hierarchical construct that assumes we want to climb the ladder. I would rather hike the horizontal, to quote @lizlerman
@arestlessart But why does that happen? Is it about value - its seen as a valued piece of work once its on the 'main' stage. Or is it about space - its a space big enough to fit all these people.
@arestlessart We performed our #NewportLegends opera @RiverfrontArts which is the 'main' stage in Newport

@arestlessart Not all companies have an opera house to perform in, but if you mean on a stage in a theatre, then yes. @WNOtweet performed Carbon 12 by @ErrollynWallen on the 'main' stage & @LaMonnaieDeMunt have worked with Howard Moody regularly to make new operas for the main stage.
